definition[0]: to encourage someone by making them feel confident and eager to do something
example[0]: We need someone who can inspire the team.
example[1]: Inspired by the sunny weather, I decided to explore the woods.
example[2]: He inspired many young people to take up the sport.
example[3]: I hope this success will inspire you to greater efforts.
definition[1]: to make someone have a particular feeling or react in a particular way
example[4]: Gandhi’s quiet dignity inspired great respect.
example[6]: The hospital’s record does not inspire confidence.
definition[2]: to give someone the idea for something, especially a story, painting, poem etc
example[7]: The story was inspired by a chance meeting with an old Russian duke.
example[8]: a range of designs inspired by wild flowers
